hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#cd /Library/WebServer/Documents/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
# for 1 connector run: orig php5.6 wikipedia.php jenkins uk #Ukranian
# for multiple conn run (six conn) #php5.6 run.php jenkins '{"connector":"gen_wikipedia_by_lang", "divisor":6, "task":"initial", "langx":"uk", "cont_2next_lang":"N", "six_coverage":"1st"}' # worked OK to force run 6 connectors.
# === STEP: fill-up missing parent entries php5.6 fill_up_undefined_parents.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "wikipedia-uk", "source_dwca": "wikipedia-uk", "resource": "fillup_missing_parents"}'
# orig: build other projects: #wikipedia-hy (Armenian)
